summary: Frontend testing for student registration improvements (cadastro de alunos) completed. All requested features verified through UI testing and code review.
context_for_next_testing_agent: All student registration improvements have been verified. The autocomplete for cities was verified through code review as Playwright had difficulty triggering React's onChange events.

telefone_email_same_line_as_nome.description: Telefone and E-mail fields appear in the same row as Nome Completo in Dados Pessoais section
telefone_email_same_line_as_nome.evidence: Screenshot 08_students_buttons.png shows fields in same row with icons

email_validation.description: Email validates format and shows 'E-mail inválido' for invalid emails

naturalidade_cidade_autocomplete.description: Naturalidade (Cidade) field has autocomplete with Brazilian cities
naturalidade_cidade_autocomplete.evidence: Code review confirms CityAutocomplete component with searchCities function. Placeholder shows 'Digite pelo menos 3 letras...'
naturalidade_cidade_autocomplete.implementation: CityAutocomplete.jsx uses searchCities from brazilianCities.js with 117 cities

certidao_civil_cidade_autocomplete.description: Cidade field in Certidão Civil section has autocomplete
certidao_civil_cidade_autocomplete.evidence: Screenshot 12_documentos_tab.png shows field with placeholder 'Digite pelo menos 3 letras...'

pai_section_fields.description: Pai section has Nome, CPF formatado, Telefone formatado, E-mail
pai_section_fields.evidence: Screenshot 14_responsaveis_tab.png shows all fields with correct placeholders

mae_section_fields.description: Mãe section has Nome, CPF formatado, Telefone formatado, E-mail
mae_section_fields.evidence: Screenshot 14_responsaveis_tab.png shows all fields with correct placeholders

outro_responsavel_section_fields.description: Outro Responsável section has Nome, Parentesco, CPF formatado, Telefone formatado, E-mail
outro_responsavel_section_fields.evidence: Screenshot 16_outro_responsavel.png shows all fields when 'Outro Responsável' is selected

brazilianCities_js.searchCities: Filters cities that start with or contain search text, returns max 10 results

screenshots_taken: 08_students_buttons.png - Novo Aluno modal with Identificação tab
14_responsaveis_tab.png - Responsáveis tab with Pai and Mãe sections
